column4: from what I understand there is some quirkyness with xinerama.. why are you using it?
I was looking into different options other than the nvidia twinview but it seems that I can't enable any desktop effects with xinerama
I think its because my nvidia driver gets bypassed when xinerama is enabled
I use to use xinerama on 6.06 but dropped it.. now I just run a BIG monitor.. nvidia should have some docs on it..
